npcID_1.npcDesc: Reginald Kensington is a butler of extraordinary stature and presence. Dressed impeccably in a tailored charcoal gray suit, complete with a perfectly knotted burgundy silk tie, Reginald commands attention with his distinguished appearance. His salt-and-pepper hair, meticulously groomed, adds an air of wisdom and experience, while his sharp gaze and discreet smile reflect his unwavering commitment to exceptional service.

npcID_2.npcDesc: Nigel Whitmore is a seasoned valet with an impeccable sense of style and a knack for anticipating his employer's every need. Clad in a tailored navy blue suit and a crisp white shirt, Nigel exudes an air of refined professionalism. His neatly combed dark hair and impeccably groomed appearance reflect his meticulous attention to detail. With a warm smile and attentive eyes, Nigel ensures that every aspect of his employer's personal grooming and wardrobe is flawlessly taken care of, embodying the epitome of tailored elegance.
